data.name: AboutToImportMagicItemsLabel
data.value: The following magic items will be imported into this campaign. Click Finish to complete the import.
data.comment: Label shown to the user to give them a chance to select magic items to import

data.name: AboutToImportMonstersLabel
data.value: The following monsters will be imported into this campaign. Click Finish to complete the import.
data.comment: Label shown to the user to allow them one last chance to view monsters before they are imported.

data.name: AboutToImportSpellsLabel
data.value: The following spells will be imported into the campaign. Click Finish to complete the import.
data.comment: Label for importing spells into a campaign
